title: Riginac111
author: Riginac111
content: At this present economic inflation in some countries and you are given three (3 btc) bitcoin to be spend within period of three (3) months for other investment that will give you return of income that worth values of three bitcoin that has been given to you to spend within three months time...my question is that as a cryptocurrency investor and bitcoin investors what investment can you join differently that will give you more than the value of bitcoin given to you? Both in your country and any other countries you maybe?If you love bitcoin don't ignore this thread.

comments.author: Hazink
comments.body: First, at what value will they use at the end of the day to determine how much the three bitcoins are worth? Will the value be captured as of the time it was given to you, or will they use the price it will be worth in 3 months to do the math?  3 months to me is too short to start up any tangible business or investment and expect a return at the end of the day, and if you also decide to invest in other crypto currencies, how sure will one be that the value of those once's won't go down under that given period? 3 months is actually too small, so if you ask me what I will do, I would rather hold that bitcoin for the next 3 months and take whatever profit it will give me at the end of the third month. or if they say I can't keep the bitcoin, then I will have to go into spot trading, sell out the bitcoin I was given, and still buy it back after a few hours or days with a little price difference, and store it for the next three months.

comments.body: Op 3bitcoin to be spent in three months as at now that the price of bitcoin is around 61k I can't think of any better investments than the bitcoin investment it self. Holding the bitcoin would definitely be the better option for me but is it a must for the profit to come within the said time of 3 months what if I don't generate profit is there a clause to return the bitcoin that was given to me if yes is the answer I will consider holding some bitcoin then switch into trading since I can generate profit under three months while trading.There is no way to think of something different from bitcoin investment because anything aside bitcoin investment under 3 months you can't guarantee yourself of making profit unless you choose to gamble or run into some ponzi scheme since they are the only investment that talks about doubling your investment capital within a short period but since bitcoin investment is not a quick money given business 3 months in making profit will be determined on the price of bitcoin when it was given to you and the current price after 3 months after your investment.

Thus, there are no other investments but real estate or forex trading. However, I know that forex trading is a higher-risk investment, which is why it is more risky than real estate, but considering the profit, or, let's say, the rewards you will get, it is also very high. So I will consider it also, which I have to go and have a higher knowledge of it before I join, because if it is not the same as bitcoin trading, but for that of real estate, I already have a bit of knowledge about that and it entails lower risk, but it is also an alternative to joining apart from bitcoin investment, so these two investments that I mentioned are capable of taking to the next level and have more profit, simpler or even more than in bitcoin.
